ModMetaData.description:
1.0.23.2 (08-06-2021)
[h1]Gameplay expansion for RimWorld.[/h1] [b]You can now...[/b] [list] [*] found a cult. [*] worship monstrous deities. [*] make offerings and animal sacrifices. [*] make human sacrifices in return for powerful spells (6 deitys and 30 spells in total, plus a dozen side effects). [/list]
[h1]This mod supports these languages: [/h1] English, Korean 한국어 (밀수업자), and Russian русский язык (kr33man)
[h1]::::: NOTICE ::::: ::::: THIS MOD NOW REQUIRES JECSTOOLS :::::: Download[/h1] http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=932008009
[h1]Recommended mods[/h1] [list] [*] Cosmic Horrors (for summoning actual monsters) [*] Industrial Age (for great lighting) [*] Realistic Darkness (for great darkness) [/list]
[h1]How do I start a cult?[/h1] 1) Load the mod. 2) Play for a few days in-game. 3) One of your pawns will investigate something horrendous. 4) Build the forbidden research center. 5) Research the strange symbols until someone founds the cult. 6) Good luck.
[h1]Tips:[/h1] [list] [*] Cult-mindedness is a new feature under 'needs' that keeps track of how likely colonists are to become cultists. [*] Better apparel means greater worship results and higher success rates for your sacrifices. [*] Beware! If too many colonists are plotting against the cult, they might take matters into their own hands. [/list]
[h1]Additions and changes by Mlie:[/h1] [*] Added support for Combat Extended [*] Removed the production-tag on altars so they can be used in thronerooms [*] Added an option to make sermons voluntary, making pawns complete some types of jobs before joining [*] Improved the sermon scheduling with some inspiration from the excellent mod [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1565942758]Colony Leadership[/url] Now you can select what days to do sermons and also when they should start in the day. [*] Added support for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2451324814][SYR] Trait Value[/url]
